EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Burner inserter at (-27.5, -62.5) that puts into transport belt
- Burner inserter at (-29.5, -60.5) that extracts from burner mining drill
- Burner inserter at (-30.5, -59.5) that extracts from burner mining drill

- Stone furnace at (-28.0, -59.0)
- Wooden chest at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -56.5)
- Burner inserter at (-27.5, -57.5) that puts into wooden chest
- Beltgroup that connects the burner mining drill to burner inserters

### Coal mine at position(-0.5, 10.5)
Consists of following entities

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities you are trying to connect are actually connectable. For example, you cannot directly connect a burner inserter to another burner inserter with a transport belt.

### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to get exists at the specified position and is of the correct type.

NAMESPACE
No new functions have been defined in this step
